content: Is there any prospect of enabling @[simps] for inductive types? This was suggested at https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/13744#discussion_r860218917 by @Eric Wieser. As far as I understand, there's no easy way to make this work, so we won't hold up this PR for it, but I thought I'd check in with @Floris van Doorn on it.

This is indeed not possible using the current implementation. It could be added, but it's not trivial. I'm not planning to add in it Lean 3, but I might be interested in doing it in Lean 4 at some point. I added it to #5489.
